entry.title: FREEZING RAIN WARNING , Grand Beach
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:46 AM CST Wednesday 28 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: -7.7°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Victoria Beach 11:00 AM CST Wednesday 28 December 2022

Pressure / Tendency: 100.0 kPa rising
Humidity: 79 %

Dewpoint: -10.6°C
Wind: E 14 km/h

entry.title: Wednesday: Light snow mixed with freezing rain. High minus 4.
entry.summary: Light snow or freezing rain. Wind east 20 km/h. High minus 4. Wind chill minus 14 this morning and minus 8 this afternoon. Forecast issued 11:20 AM CST Wednesday 28 December 2022

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of light snow. Low minus 8. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of light snow and risk of freezing drizzle. Fog patches developing overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 8. Wind chill minus 8 this evening and minus 13 overnight. Forecast issued 11:20 AM CST Wednesday 28 December 2022

entry.title: Thursday: Light snow. Temperature falling to minus 11 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Light snow. Risk of freezing drizzle early in the morning. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Wind becoming northwest 30 km/h in the morning. Temperature falling to minus 11 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 12 in the morning and minus 19 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 11:20 AM CST Wednesday 28 December 2022
